mapper.select: select id, club_id, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_club_dept where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_club_dept(club_id, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{clubId}, #{deptId}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into sys_club_dept(club_id, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.clubId}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into sys_club_dept(club_id, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.clubId}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update club_id = values(club_id), dept_id = values(dept_id), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_club_dept
club_id = #{clubId},
dept_id = #{deptId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
